bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for a Smart Transducer Interface for Sensors and Actuators
Transducers to Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) Systems Communication Protocols and Transducer Electronic Data Sheet Formats

IEEE Standard for a Smart Transducer Interface for Sensors and Actuators - Transducers to Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) Systems Communication Protocols and Transducer Electronic Data Sheet Formats
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1451.7/D1.01, Jan 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard introduces data formats designed to facilitate communications between Radio Frequency IDentification (RFID) systems and smart RFID tags with integral transducers (sensors and actuators). The standard defines new Transducer Electronic Data Sheet (TEDS) formats for smart RFID tags, based on the IEEE 1451 family of standards. This standard also defines a comprehensive command set for smart RFID tags.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
